text: E fo, gavman a Godɨn ingangarir gumazim, egha an arazir aghuibar, ian akurvaghasa ia bagha ingari. Nɨ arazir kuram damigh gavmanɨn atiating. Nɨ fo, gumazibagh asɨghɨsɨghamin ingangarim ko gavgavim gavmanɨn dafarimɨn iti, a puram aningɨn suirazir puvatɨ. A Godɨn ingangarir gumazim, nɨ tina arazir kuram damightɨ, a nɨn arazir kuramɨn ivezim nɨ danɨngam.
